shoulder-stretch.name: Shoulder Stretch
shoulder-stretch.description: Stretch your shoulder muscles to improve flexibility and prevent injuries.

toe-touch.name: Toe Touch
toe-touch.description: Bend forward and touch your toes to stretch your hamstrings and lower back.

neck-rotation.name: Neck Rotation
neck-rotation.description: Rotate your neck gently to release tension and improve neck mobility.

lunges.name: Lunges
lunges.description: Perform lunges to strengthen your leg muscles and improve balance.

hamstring-stretch.name: Hamstring Stretch
hamstring-stretch.description: Stretch your hamstrings to improve flexibility and prevent muscle tightness.

quad-stretch.name: Quad Stretch
quad-stretch.description: Stretch your quadriceps muscles to improve flexibility and prevent injuries.

calf-stretch.name: Calf Stretch
calf-stretch.description: Stretch your calf muscles to improve flexibility and prevent muscle tightness.

jumping-jacks.name: Jumping Jacks
jumping-jacks.description: Perform jumping jacks to elevate your heart rate and improve cardiovascular fitness.

onspot-jogging.name: Jogging in place
onspot-jogging.description: Jog in place to get your heart rate up and burn calories.

push-ups.name: Push-Ups
push-ups.description: Perform push-ups to strengthen your upper body muscles, including chest, shoulders, and triceps.

burpees.name: Burpees
burpees.description: Perform burpees to work multiple muscle groups and improve cardiovascular fitness.

mountain-climbers.name: Mountain Climbers
mountain-climbers.description: Perform mountain climbers to engage your core muscles and improve cardiovascular endurance.

curls.name: Curls
curls.description: Perform curls to strengthen your biceps muscles.

bench-press.name: Bench Press
bench-press.description: Perform bench press to strengthen your chest, shoulders, and triceps muscles.

squats.name: Squats
squats.description: Perform squats to strengthen your leg muscles, including quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.
